attributes.action: Stop assuming that Pepsi is an acceptable sub for Coca Cola
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on all cafe, pubs and restaraunts to stop assuming that Pepsi is an acceptable substitute for Coca Cola.

This petition would not accept the following conversation:

A: "Hello, could I have a Coke please?"

B: "We don't have Coke, is Pepsi ok?"

Obviously it is not. It would accept a small differentiation from the following:

A: "Hello, could I have a Coke please?"

B: "We don't have Coke, would you like to look at our other beverage offerings?"

FIN.
